description: recto: seated Madonna and Child; Mary has bare feet, with PR foot resting on a riser; nude Christ child with arms spread outward; other sketchy figure studies in black chalk around main figures; verso: John seated on clouds accompanied by a large bird at right; John is writing on a tablet; long curly hair; sheet affixed to mount with black tape on recto and verso
